SqlTable.SqlScriptCreate: CREATE TABLE [dbo].[ImmobiliAgestaNETClasseEnergetica] ( [ImmobiliAgestaNETClasseEnergetica_Ky] int IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL , [classe_energetica] varchar(100) NULL , [Annunci_ClasseEnergetica] varchar(200) NULL ) ALTER TABLE [dbo].[ImmobiliAgestaNETClasseEnergetica] ADD CONSTRAINT PK_ImmobiliAgestaNETClasseEnergetica PRIMARY KEY ([ImmobiliAgestaNETClasseEnergetica_Ky])
